content.detailedDescription: I went out on my patio (i live on the top/3rd floor of my building) as i could not sleep at about 1:40 am and saw this light in the sky coming towards me that was just over the top of the building across from me.  i live on the intracoastal waterway and this object with flashing red and white lights was headed west through the trees on the other side of the water.  there was no sound emitting from it and it was traveling pretty fast. as i watched it i thought that cant be an airplane as its flying too low.  i have an airport a few miles from me and knew it was not a plane or a helicopter. from what i could tell it was round and not very big maybe 30 feet across. i also noticed dogs barking across the canal from me as it went over the homes there. it passed my building and i did not see it anymore. it was passing through the trees so i knew it could not be a plane. i live exactly 1 mile from the beach and it seemed that is where this object originated from. i wish i had taken out my camera but it passed by too quickly for me to get it,
content.summary: I was looking at ths sky and saw this lighted object over the top of the 3rd floor buildings

content.detailedDescription: Went out for routine sky watching with my girlfriend, and we noticed two ufos at once.  one was nne and the other was ene, close in proximity.  they glowed red/green/white/blue and hovered for some time before moving around a bit.  they both moved in various paths, pulsated the different lights, and remained star-like after about 45mins activity.  we next saw a craft very high in the sky with multiple lights, looked almost diamond/kite like, and it was very faint.  we only noticed because some of the lights would flash randomly.  one craft came from off the ground east of where we were at, glowing orange/red and took position underneath a pre-existing ene ufo (which was in "stationary" mode - it looked like a star)  it moved around and then stayed stationary like a star.  next we saw an orange light close to the ground north of our position, we ran to the treeline and used a flashlight to survey the location, and the orange light disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 ufo siting springfield louisiana

content.detailedDescription: I'm a late night person. at 1:04am 6/22/12 i was on the front porch facing south. i do not hear a sound in the sky. all of a sudden i hear a huge swooping jet roar and with a few seconds i see a black triangle with red and green lights at the wing tips and white light in front. obviously jet aircraft the size of a b2 bomber. the military constantly flies over the house back and forth this direction so there is no doubt. as i am looking at this aircraft it is all most directly over head, and over the trees in front of the house which is a distance of about 20-25ft. as the aircraft is flying in a northwest direction about half from where i initially saw the aircraft emerge to where it disappears i see a yellowish/gold circular type orb flying from the right side of the sky above the trees and flies toward the aircraft, underneath the craft, out the left rear side of the craft towards the east. the orb moves in a curvature like maneuver.  from the time i heard the craft until it emerged was about 2 seconds. from the time the craft emerged until both the craft and the orb disappeared was about 3-4 seconds. the orb appeared to have disappeared behind the mountain. i have a photographic memory so i remember the whole event (as quick as it was) frame by frame. i quickly wrote everything down within 4 minutes. it happened so quickly i was completely startled. my heart was jumping! i thought the initial roar of the aircraft was a bomb at first until i saw the craft emerge. strangely the weather was nice that day 6/21 (sighting at 1:04am 6/22) and now today 6/22 into 6/23 (as i write this) it's been pouring down rain all day and dark clouds loom over. also i noted after the sighting that vehicles were strangely driving slower than normal for almost 30+ minutes. there was a strange feeling in the air and later at 1:27am i went back out side and heard a strange clash/bang noise somewhere out in the distance towards the south west, maybe as far as a mile away, or more, not to sure, but it was faint and i've never heard it before. also on a nice day i will hear various farm animals and wildlife making their sounds well late into the night namely dogs, peacocks, coyotes and roosters. yeah, roosters are weird here. i did not hear any of these animals but i did sight a hungry bear at around 3:00 am getting into the trash bin. as for the size of the orb i would say somewhere between the size of a star in the sky and an aspirin. furthermore the craft and orb were flying so low about as high as the mountains if not lower around 1200ft or less and definitely below cloud cover as there was minimal clouds in the sky at the time so not cloudless. i am speculating that the craft was flying below highest mountain elevation at an angle.  i would say the craft was undoubtedly between the size of a nickel and a quarter and definitely closer towards the quarter held at arm length towards the sky. i had no problem seeing the lights, the red, green, and white lights were not blended together at all, like you would see with a craft at a further distance.I would love to hear from mufon investigators about any information in the area, opinions, and questions.
content.summary: Glowing yellowish gold. moving faster than aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my husband to return to the truck. when a light caught my eye i looked up to the southwest and seen two objects like birds but they were bright silver in color and reflecting sunlight back but they did manuvers only birds could do they were abouve the clouds and would come in and out of clouds. i was facinated and asked by husband what kind of bird can reflect like that and he had no answer other than it was like nothing he or i had ever seen befor. i didnt want to leave but was facinated by the objects but i am a traveling nurse and had a 2 hour drive ahead of me and had to go. the day was clear with few high clouds and a breeze coming out of the west about 15-20 mls hour. time was 1700 hours and was witnessed for around 5 min.
content.summary: Two to three silver objects moving rapid and darting back and forth in sky

content.detailedDescription:
June,22,2012 
 
 at 10:45 pm, i look ne in the sky and saw a bright object that was simular to a star . it moved ten times faster than an air plane. it did not have the flashing lights as an air plane though. 
 i told my husband to turn around and look but it was taking its time until he turned around it blinked twice, slowed down and the brightness dimmed down . and it disapeared into the night time sky. as the bright object was disapearing the lights were slowy giving out .
content.summary: Flying object (not an air plane)

content.detailedDescription: At 1618hrs on june16,2012 i was in my driveway,just washed my car, i looked up at the sky facing west the sun was below the tree line i was watching a high altitude jet with two contrails ejected from the rear. iwas trying to guess if it was military or a passanger jet and where it was going traveling west the jet was so far away that i was unable to discern any fuselodge or wings.  it was at this point that i saw a bright flash of light below the contrails of the jet. i could make out a body shape, it was sort of oval shape with its' front small, roundish then extending and widening out towards the rear. there were no lights, no sound, no visible exhaust trail no structural appendages ie. no wings,no tail wings no tail fin the craft apperaerd in the west but seemed to be traveling south or i should say was wobbling south it wobbled right to left so it wobled away from me then back to me, the object seemed almost out of control and then it just vanished. a couple of minutes passed by after this sighting occured iwas trying to digest what i just wittnessed when i stilll looking up i saw a jet traveling east this jet was approximattely the samme altitude as the ' u f o' i could discern wings, fuselodge, tailwings, and atailfin. ther was no contrail but i could hear the engine noiseof this 3rd. vehicle..  so dear mufon committee, muddle thru this and see  what ya think..
content.summary: Bright flash of light, saw reflective object,wobble side to side, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside around 9pm to check on my cat. i found him sitting under the bird feeder so i turned my attention to the stars. i was looking towards the south-southwest at saturn when i noticed what i thought was some extra stars that looked out of place. they were roughly around 0 magnitude. about as bright as the other brighter stars in the sky. as i tried to figure out what i was looking at, the "stars" brightened and slightly moved. i then realized that they wasn't stars but 3 lights in a triangle pattern. i said out loud to myself, "are you kidding me?" they appeared to be hovering, but moved slightly. as i watched the lights, they brightened again i'm guessing to around -7 magnitude and then slowly faded out. after the lights went out, i was unable to see anything. the whole thing probably lasted less than a minute, but it's stuck with me ever since. oddly, about an hour later, i developed a very bad headache. i don't know if this was related to the sighting or not but i never get headaches. and, this one never left till the following day.

i've been into astronomy ever since i was a kid. i photograph and video lunar occultations, meteors, satellites, iridium flares and other astronomical objects. i've seen planes, satellites, meteors, just about anything you can think of that would be in the night sky. but, i ain't never seen anything like this.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle pattern that brightened twice before slowly fading out.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out at 9:40pm-looking north my husband and i saw a very bright red light.  at first we thought it was fireworks of some kind but then it began to move very slow toward us.  it came over head with absolutely no sound..Changing colors from very bright red to very white/yellowish light..It was sunlight bright..It moved over our heads and gained speed..Very quickly moving in the southwesterly direction..Disappearing rapidly.  this happened too quickly for us to grab our flip video.
content.summary: Very bright and pulsating reddish/orange with bright white flashes.  no sound-came right over us..Low so bright couldn't make out shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was alone at home letting my dogs out. it was morning. i looked up and saw the ufo. i first thought it was sometime of plane from the first glance. but it was not. i soon realized what it was, this has happened before. there was one at first and then three others to follow that came out of no where. i ran inside to get my cell phone, to snap a picture.  but when i came back it was completely gone. the other time i saw this was in october of 2011. it was at night and i was with my mother driving. the ufos moved just like they did that morning when i saw them for the second time. the first time they looked like fire balls in the sky and hovered slowly in a triangular shape together. when i saw them that morning i knew it was exactly what we saw in october.
content.summary: In the morning, ufo was sauser/sphere like, silver, gray.

content.detailedDescription: I was alone at home letting my dogs out. it was morning. i looked up and saw the ufo. i first thought it was sometime of plane from the first glance. but it was not. i soon realized what it was, this has happened before. there was one at first and then three others to follow that came out of no where. i ran inside to get my cell phone, to snap a picture.  but when i came back it was completely gone. the other time i saw this was in october of 2011. it was at night and i was with my mother driving. the ufos moved just like they did that morning when i saw them for the second time. the first time they looked like fire balls in the sky and hovered slowly in a triangular shape together. when i saw them that morning i knew it was exactly what we saw in october.
content.summary: In the morning, ufo was sauser/sphere like, silver, gray.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch, facing west. i was noticing the thin cresent moon & observed what i thought to be an unknown triangular constellation. the triangle base was aprox. 20 degrees above the horizon & tip aprox. 40 degrees. i asked the person with me what constellation it was. as i pointed it out, the lower right "star" started moving. it went from west slightly northwest, to a point aprox. 45 degrees toward the south, slightly southeast. at that point it turned, changed from a bright blueish white, to a amber, orange & accelerated away from earth staying at the aprox. 45 degree point in the sky. we both watched as the object went further & further away to the point of past the furthest visable star in aprox 8 to 10 seconds!
content.summary: Bright blueish white light, hovered, then moved to southeast, turned & moved away from earth rapidly

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at night helping bring in groceries. a bright star moving making a jet noise. thought it was an airplane. descended in an angled motion toward a wooded area. i've seen transformers 1-3 enough times to know that was a transformer.
content.summary: Falling meteor

content.detailedDescription:
I have been documenting geo engineering events for a some time using color and infrared video camcorders along with color and infrared nikon digital cameras. this is not the first time i have captured these objects. on june 20, 2012 at approx 8:30 am i was taking video and photos of geo engineering events over the antelope valley ca. at approx 10am an unmarked white tanker size jet flying east to west at a low altitude fired 4 explosive chemical charges from it's rear. the charges exploded some distance behind the jet forming a chemical looking cloud formations. several minutes after this event numerous orbs flew in, flying around, in and out of the man made cloud formations. these orbs are round white objects all appearing to be the same shape and size. i observed the orbs flying, quickly changing directions, hovering, slow movement and very rapid movements. some of the orbs appeared to be chasing each other in what appeared to be an attempt to keep them away from the cloud formation. i have one color digital photo of the saucer shaped object which was under one of the man made cloud formations. i have color and infrared photos along with infrared video of the orbs. i have many hours of past events involving orbs involved with geo engineering events. i have not had the time to go through all the footage. every time i do carefully review past video and photos these things are there. i have tried contacting several other groups involved with these events but no one seems to be interested.
thank you for your time. attached are several photos.
content.summary: Approx 20 round orbs flying around, in and out of cloud formation. one disk shaped object hovering below cloud formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was picking my son up from work in branson on hwy 248. i picked him up at 9 p.M. we were in an intersection next to the cedar ridge school. we were leaving his work when my youngest son said, "what is that?" he pointed to the sky. we seen an object in the sky, pretty close. i can't say for sure, but probably about a mile away. maybe not even that. it looked like a red orb, glowing like a flame. it was hovering and moving slowly across the sky. i wasn't able to continue looking at it since i was driving but my son said it started moving up and down and back and forth. we were not able to continue to follow it because we were in an intersection. so we lost site of the object. i asked my sons if they had ever seen anything like that. they said, "no." we all described the same thing. this was definitely a ufo. we were all so shocked. my oldest son tried to take a picture, but it didn't turn out.
content.summary: Branson, mo ufo sighted looked like a fireball.

content.detailedDescription:
I left my house for a walk, i then heard children and adults commenting on what they saw in the sky, one of the children screamed ���alien invasion!���, which obviously drew my attention so i also looked up at the sky. 
	
	there in the sky i saw three orange lights, in a triangular formation. whatever they were, they didn���t break this formation for 3 minutes. the lights were strong and they were solid, no blinking, and they were much larger than the stars i could see. they also moved faster than any of the airplanes (blinking lights) that were outside at that time. 

	after 3 minutes, 2 of the lights went out, and then one turned back on, and off, and the other on and off. the ufos then went in separate directions, and the lights all disappeared.
content.summary: 3 orange lights flying in formation over orange county, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and 10 of my friends and relatives were on the back deck of my house.
when i looked up and saw this violet non changing color or brightness tear drop shaped golfball sized object moving in a straight line west to east 
this was thursday evening at 11p.M. 6/21/12. i brought attention to the object so everyone with me would see it. seamed like 3 to 4 minutes we watched until trees hide the horizon. only 20 degrees from straight
overhead north of green bay wisconsin. has anyone else seen this?
content.summary: Violet teardrop shaped ,no color variance. straight line of flight west to east 11pm. 6/21/12

content.detailedDescription:
Two friends of mine wanted me to report a sighting they had on june 20th.
they were outdoors when they both noticed a very bright light hovering in the sky over sonora tx, it was stationary for a short while then took off with a very high rate of speed. they said they were amazed at how bright it was and how it made no sound whatsoever. they both noted that nothing they knew of could travel that fast. this happened at or around 12:30 am.
content.summary: Very , very bright light that hovered  then took off at super high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was outside watering the trees on june 20th 2012 at approximately 9:45 pm.  she called to me "look at this ship, i've never seen anything like this."  i came outside and witnessed a dark boomerang shaped object located approximately 2000 ft from my home about 1000 ft off the ground.  the object appeared to be about 300 ft in width and 150 ft in length.  the object was traveling on a heading of 190 degress and passed directly over noblesville airport to our south.  when first observed the object made a weird vibrating sound, but no other sounds came from the vehicle.  the sound was sufficiently loud to make my dog start barking at the object.  the color of the object is uknown but seemed to blend with the evening sky.  there were three lights visible on the object.  two white lights at each tip flashing in unison and a steady red light under the nose that did not flash at all.  the object continued to travel south at a steady rate of speed until it was lost behind trees.  no direction change was witnessed.  the speed stayed constant.  the speed was approximately 90 knots.  my wife said she first heard the object pulsating before she saw it.  the dog started barking at the object and that is when she turned to look at the object.  she said that she knew immediately this was not an airplane and called for me to come and look.

a few days before this sighting my brother in-law was staying overnight at our house.  he observed two chinook helicopters and an unidentifiable (never seen this type before / looked very strange) helicopter that passed right over our house.  they were clearly observed as not having any markings and all painted black.  they were low enough to make the house shake and windows rattle.  approximately 100 ft off the ground.
content.summary: Traingular aircraft with pulsating sound and non aviation lights sighted over noblesville, in.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm visiting family in joplin, missouri, and mom asked me to step outside and see a ufo. the sun set about an hour before, and what she pointed out to me was a slow moving, bright star in the south. i figured it was probably a reflection off a satellite, and it disappeared after about 10 minutes. it was moving due east, but it was unremarkable. while watching it, with the binoculars, i happened to see some flashing faa lights in the north east and when i zoomed in on them another set zoomed across the frame. it was a little frightening, so i stopped and looked with the naked eye, and there was a section of sky kind of ablaze with activity. once i got some perspective on it, there were 3 sets of faa lights that seemed to be jets, they went nnw, and then one circled back and headed out of sight in the opposite direction, while the two others took up positions flanking some large lights that were not flashing. those lights seemed to turn wsw, and they were not flashing. when i zoomed in with 7x35 mm binoculars, there were 3 distinct crafts, they seemed almost like cubes with backlighting that was more prominent on the corners of the craft highlighting the cube shape.  my dad wandered outside, and i hollered at my wife to come see the event, so we had 4 adults all seeing the same thing.  it was definitely not chinese lanterns.  they moved similar in speed to conventional jets, but their shape was different, with no apparent wings, and no faa lights.

the entire time there was an apparent roar, but it was deeper in tone than typical fighter jets or even commercial airliners. it seemed to be a very large type of engine, or something operating at very high power. just as i ran in to post this, the were starting to near the western horizon, and the sound was at its loudest. 

i observed many other typical passenger jets after the sighting, and in comparison to those jets, these were much lower.  the cubes were a little larger than the escort jets.  the size change when zoomed in with the binoculars was significant, so i take that to mean they were fairly close to me, compared to other jets i observed through the binoculars.  

the roar was similar to a jet roar, but much deeper and rumbly.  it reminded me seeing an f117a flyover at an airshow.  the roar was significant enough to get the attention of the kids when they walked outside.

the event stood out to me for the following reasons.  the initial activity was a bit chaotic, with multiple craft and direction changes.  i first thought it was fighter jets training or mock dog-fighting, but then the 3 larger crafts headed in a direct line and two of the jets took up flanking positions, while one zoomed out of sight in the direction from where they originated.  they did not follow the same jet paths as any of the normal passenger jet flyovers, and the noise was significantly louder, deeper, and more rumbling than anything else i've ever heard at this location.

the attached sketch attempts to capture the size comparison between the cubes and the escort jets.  this is how it looked through the binoculars when zoomed in.  the shape of the jet was easily discernible.  the red wingtip lights were visible, and both white strobes, but the opposite green wingtip was not visible.  the cubes seemed to be a yellowish, orangish strong middle glow, with whiter light concentrated at the tips.  the light was steady, and seemed to be more of an internal glow instead of distinct exterior lights.
content.summary: 3 large illuminated cube-like structures escorted by jets with faa lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Thought we saw 4 meteors was very excited to see them at our vacation cabin. right after seeing what we thought were meteors about 4 objects were doing figure 8's in the sky. we shined a flash light 30 mins after watching them towards objects(they looked like stars moving at this point) one got very bright at one point and the perception that my father, friend and i it looked like it way heading strait for us. we ran away from the lake at that point. we got half way to the cabin and my friend turned and saw it was no longer coming towards us. these things kept moving very fast. about a hour into it we saw two very bright lights to the right of us over the lake. they seemed to meet together for about 10 mins (no notice) seemed small yet close to us at the time(half a mile out in the center of the lake). after 10 mins they took off at a great speed and nothing was seen after that.

weather:clear
sky:open no trees over a lake

i was about 14 years old at the time. just learned of this website today. we have carried this event with us for many many years.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought we saw 4 meteors was very excited to see them at our vacation cabin

content.detailedDescription: At about 10pm i was looking out my window of my (top floor 5th floor) apartment building, facing south, with a good wide view of the sky, despite some trees.  directly above me-and-building, moves this white glowing but diffused light larger than a star.  it is coming from north-west going south east.  about as fast as a sorta low small plane, i guess. an aircraft (plane) is coming from east and going west, at the same moment.  (about 8 inches at arm's length, up from my horizon, i think.) when the object/light is about 1 half inch (at arm's length) from the plane's nose, it vanishes.
content.summary: Odd diffused light comes at plane

content.detailedDescription: Wow, this has been a milestone night for me. i saw lots of activity. the attached video shows some of it. boring stuff, but it shows the activity above us. this was recorded about 1:30 am on june 22, 2012. basically i wait to see something happening and then turn on the camcorder. in future i will run with the camcorder on all the time. what i also saw with my night vision on, was a boomerang or gull wing craft streaking throught the sky. it had metallic silvery blue lights at each wing tip. i could clearly see structure to the craft and a bit of reflection from the ground lights. it blew my mind and reaffirmed all of my other sigthings to date. i also saw a small fleet cross the sky. there were about 8 in an unequal v formation with about 4 stragglers behind it. i have not personally seen a fleet before. i feel priviledged.
content.summary: Orbs, gull wing craft. small fleet

content.detailedDescription:
Star watching with my girlfriend, and noticed multiple flashing objects in sky.  some emitted red, white, and green lights, others faded and we took notice to other lights near those flashing.  these looked like triangle flashing light formations.  we also saw a very close, fluid moving red object .  this could not have been a plane as assumed at first, because the object stopped frequently, changed paths, and ascended/descended very fluidly.  we actually saw 3 planes while sitting out there.  they blinked white lights and stayed on a straight path.
we were sitting near a pond for about 45 minutes when my girlfriend made a sudden noise with some cans.  immediately, something in the pond proceeded to walk across the water and disappear about 10ft into the pond.  i say walk across the water because the wake/waves/disturbance in the water was extremely minimal, and it was odd because we had been in the same spot moving and walking around for approximately 45 minutes before the entity took notice of us.  if this were any normal pond animal, it would have left when we first came to the pond due the noise we had made.  what was also strange was that my girlfriend witnessed the whole thing, but couldn't recall what the entity looked like.  all she noticed was how it was walking on the water seemlessly and appeared small and black.  i believe it was a little plantlike alien entity spying on us because we have been investigating the skies for the past 3 weeks.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Springfield, la - mult. ufo sightings & close encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside on my front porch having a smoke when i glanced up at the sky like i do most nights. i was facing the west horizon when i saw what looked a very bright star so i didn't think anything was out of the norm until it began to move. it made a sudden burst of movement east then move west of the horizon then banked south west until it was no longer visible. i was surprised and a little creeped out by it because like i said before, i thought it was a star!
content.summary: Thought it was a star at first glance but then it started to move

content.detailedDescription: Star like object flying southwest of acturius, disappeared faintly after apx 1.5 mins
content.summary: Star like object flying southwest of acturius, disappeared faintly after apx 1.5 mins

content.detailedDescription: I saw 2 non-pulsing lights heading straight north at 11:56 pm 06212012.  they did not make a sound and the lights did not flash like a plane.  we assumed they were satellites but i didn't think satellites moved north.  then i heard and saw a plane with red blinking lights coming from the east to the intercept area of 2 lights.  when it got close to the position i saw a non pulsing light heading back south without sound.  satellites do not change direction.  this was moving faster than any satellite i have ever seen.  the red flashing lights and plane looked unusual too as it appeared the lights were really far apart given how faint the sound appeared.  the non-blinking lights were moving much faster than the plane.  did any one else see this?  i would like to know what this was.
content.summary: Lights in the sky heading north

content.detailedDescription: That's about it - wife was with me - possible military craft - but strange - no sonic boom -  i'm capable of estimating speed - not sure due to "star" like observation - i think it was subsonic until it accelerated out of view (acceleration speed 2000 mph+ best guess)
content.summary: Star like object got my attention while sitting on my back deck.  i have 20/15 vision and was raised around military aircraft my entire life - know the difference.  no aircraft lights - heading east - accelerated out of view - deffinitely strange.

content.detailedDescription: This is the third time i���ve seen this object, and this is the second video of it. the first video is also here from a sighting on june 5, 2012. because i had seen this twice before (and in the same part of the sky), i set my camcorder on a tripod, placed it on the porch pointing in the same direction, and turned it on. on friday, june 15, 2012, i captured the object again, and this time from the very beginning until it faded away, as usual. however, it does not first exhibit the line of lights as i had seen before, but just the orb itself. near the end of this video, some lines are noticeable going into the object from the left and right side near the bottom. i will continue setting up the camcorder to capture another video.
content.summary: Second video of glowing orb over chandler, arizona

content.detailedDescription: The same event as the last few nights. same object, same light, vanished same way.
content.summary: Bluish white light that vanished

content.detailedDescription:
While taking a night trip to washington, as we were leaving portland on i-84 e we noticed something large looming over our vehicle. i was in the back seat, and saw it last, and the driver was having a hard time concentrating - wanting the view the object that looked like it was going to land on us but not wanting to get into a wreck. earlier, we had been put on edge with seeing some kind of light flash far in the distance, in the direction we were driving.  looking up, in the small amount of time we had to get a good look, a gigantic black triangle hovered partway over the road, and partway over the lower area to the left of the road. it had small lights on each corner of the triangle, and a small center light. there was no spotlight or beam type of light coming from the lights, they seemed extremely flat and were out of view at a certain distance because of the angle.  we caught a hint of patterns etched into the black/grey surface of the triangle, but it was such a short glance we cannot be sure what we saw in regards to the types of patterns - the best i can say is something like squiggles or abstract lines, nothing like the outline of a hull door or definite squares and lines that you see on normal planes. more like it was decorated, not for function.  it had a hint of being metallic, but it was nighttime viewing an extremely dark object, so our 'hints' are vague at best.  the "point" of the triangle was pointed towards portland, behind us. it had the look of having either just landed and was heading up, or was descending down, but our speed on the highway plus the fact it was hovering and not moving forward or backwards, it was hard to tell. i got the best view looking out the back of the car, and saw it as we drove away. it was most definitely larger than any plane, say if you watch a plane land and you see its actual size, it was much larger. it was below the tree line so soon it was obscured by the trees (we were getting into a much more forested part of i-84 e), and at this time me and my fiance (the driver) and our friend were in a heated "oh my god what was that" discussion, and going methodically through makes and models of planes and military aircrafts.  i couldn't contribute much, being the only girl in the car. i just kept looking at the sky. soon, i start noticing more triangle shapes coming out of the distant clouds, some that had already been making their way over the mountains and were getting closer to the city. they were all headed precisely towards portland. they came from both our left and our right, but at this time i'm first noticing the ones on our right.  i still have a good view of portland behind us, and i see two triangles making their way towards the river and the bridge we passed over only minutes ago. near them, a plane is on its normal route, giving me a good comparison for size. the lights seem bigger than the plane lights, and the shapes (made more noticeable by being darker than the sky and blotting out what stars were there - the clouds were in front of us, it was clear above portland). i had no way to tell if the plane noticed or not. it just went along its way. the triangles (moving at a speed maybe a little faster than the plane, but not by much - they had a way of seeming 'unconcerned' and 'confident', but i'm emotional and tend to put feelings on things that there's no actual way to tell that's how they felt).  some seemed to have their middle light on, and some did not.  at this point, i begin to panic, thinking that we were being invaded by someone on the coast and this was our military coming to fight the war - or it was an enemy force coming to bomb the heck out of portland. i kept thinking, "stealth bombers are triangles, right?!" so i was convinced portland was going to be bombed, and i couldn't help but think of my family and friends. i proceeded to be emotional, and panic. i also continued to observe. i watch as a helicopter moves across the bridge, following the river like most news helicopters do (i couldn't tell what color the helicopter was, but the shape seemed average, nothing special) and was headed straight for the triangles. it seemed maybe slightly lower altitude then them, where they had seemed slightly lower than the plane from before.  i kept thinking that the helicopter couldn't possibly not see them - they were headed straight for each other! i watched as they got closer and closer but soon our momentum with the traffic of i-84e took us too far and i couldn't see. i looked at the rest of the sky and saw 2 to 4 more on each side, coming from the mountains and clouds, and headed in the same direction - portland. i continued to panic, completely forgetting i had a camera sitting in the purse that i had so casually at my feet. trust me, i've regretted this every single day after and will for the rest of my life. i continued to see them appear to each side of us, and above us (i have to mention, these are all higher elevation than the one we first passed, that seemed low enough for  us to be able to hear any noise and be deaf from it, if it were any normal aircraft - but it was silent. these were all at different heights but still much higher than that one. we soon noticed that we were following the tail end of a thunderstorm, headed northeast like we were. it seemed like these crafts were coming out of that storm, headed south/southwest. soon, there were no more, and i had my face glued to the windows the rest of the night, not wanting to miss a single second of possibly seeing any more. because i was sure, if i stared at it long enough, i would be enlightened to what it was, and be assured that it wasn't going to bomb portland.  the storm, which ended up right where we were headed, was a strong one, tons of lightning and thunder and apparently even started some wildfires in yakima, our destination. we arrived in yakima with the horizon tinted with the glowing red of fires, very common in that area in the summertime. we eventually dared to say it - that they might have been ufo's, something not human. we still tossed around bombers and military crafts but the nagging feeling that we just saw something amazing and otherworldly just wouldn't leave us. we were shaken up. i have no idea if any other cars saw this - i honestly didn't look anywhere but the sky as soon as this started.  and between the three of us, we can't seem to agree which lights were red and which were white, and sadly, three years long its been and i couldn't tell you which colors were where. our minds were overwhelmed with trying to figure out what was happening, i think.  it lasted a while - i did not look at any clocks during this time and it both seemed over so fast and also an eternity - depending on when my fear was at its most.  it was late, so i could not call anyone back home to see if they saw anything in the sky, or you know, got bombed. we went home the next day and asked, and no one seemed to have seen or heard about what we saw. no one was bombed. everything was fine. i probably should have reported this, but i didn't know where to go to report it and i felt like no one would believe me if i spoke to strangers about it. my family was hard enough, but i sat down and drew diagrams and was determined to at least help them understand that iiii believe what i saw. but i still do not know what i saw. but this is the type of things you need reported, correct? i hope that my report helps, i'm sorry it took 3 years for me to find out who to go to and realize its important enough to report at all.  

i don't know if i should also mention this, but around the same time in 2011 i was sitting in the back yard of my friends house in beaverton oregon, and we were discussing "deep" subjects and looking at the stars, when two objects that we thought were merely satellites started moving erratically, impossibly, then disappeared into nothing. i have been an avid meteor-shower watcher and sky gazer my whole life, well trained by my science and space loving mother, and i know satellites and stars and that was certainly neither! it was fast, but not like a bug, but nothing like how any aircraft can move. went in tight zigzags for a moment then flew off into nowhere, just gone. me and my friend looked at each other and just went "uhhh....Did you see what i saw?!" and felt a tingle in our spines.  that was certainly less scary than our 2010 experience! this, by the way, was a different friend, than the one with us in the car the night of the triangles.  it was her first sighting of anything like that, haha. we were both just grinning silly and couldn't help but talk about more 'interesting' topics after that.  i felt emboldened to speak about my experience with the triangles, and she took it well.   anyway, thank you for letting me tell my story. i hope i helped, at all. (and sorry i didn't have the presence of mind to get my camera out - i'm never letting myself off the hook for that as long as i live - and i hope i'm better prepared if i ever see anything strange like that again!)

-deanna
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Saw multiple large black triangle shaped unidentified crafts in sky while leaving portland, coming towards the city. they  were coming out of a thunderstorm.
